templateOptions.label: ClientID
templateOptions.description: The ClientID to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: ClientSecret
templateOptions.description: The ClientSecret to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: UserName
templateOptions.description: The UserName to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: Password
templateOptions.description: The password belonging to the UserName

templateOptions.label: WG_Employees
templateOptions.description: The name of the 'werkgever' or 'employer' for the employees.

templateOptions.label: WG_Departments
templateOptions.description: The name of the 'werkgever' or 'employer' for the deparments and functions.

templateOptions.label: Enable TLS1.2
templateOptions.description: Enables TLS 1.2. Note that is not necessary when running the connector in the cloud
